page.title: 13MY DAY _ AT SCHOOL
page.content:
SCHOOL STARTS AT 9-20AM AND AFTER REGISTRATION AND DINNER NUMBERS WE GO TO ASSEMBLY.AFTER THIS WE HAVE MATHEMATICS.AT 10-35 WE HAVE BREAK.THIS IS FOLLOWED BY ENGLISH;WE DO COMPREHENSION OR GRAMMAR AND THATS FUN.FOR DINNER WE HAVE QUITE A VARIETY OF THINGS;SAUSAGE AND CHIPS,SALAD,BEANS AND MANY OTHER THINGS.FOR SWEET WE HAVE JELLY,RICE PUDDING,TRIFLE AND MUCH MUCH MORE.AFTER DINNER WE GO INTO THE FIELD,WHERE WE HAVE A ROUNDERS AND RUGBY PITCH,A RUNNING TRACK AND A SAND PIT.AFTER DINNER WE DO HISTORY OR WELSH AND IN SCIENCE WE HAVE WORKCARDS AND INTERESTING EXPERIMENTS.WE HAVE A BREAK AT 2-30PM AND THEN DO EITHER ART,CRAFT,GAMES OR GYMNASTICS.
KAREN JONES AGE 11
